answers.answer: I am getting it too, when I wear crew socks.  The tighter the socks the worse and quicker I get the itch. But if the socks are mostly cotton, with less stretch (spandex,nylon,etc) then less chance of itch

question: I'm doing a research what might cause itchy ankles without a rash. If anyone has this, please post. Dry skin, varicose veins, lack of vitamin B, psoriasis, and diabetes are conditions I've found so far.
title: Itchy ankles without a rash, anyone?
